title: Powering an Enterprise Fleet
description: HubPro is an enterprise mobile app that powers a fleet of over 5,000 drivers.  I worked with senior management on product strategy and helped the delivery team build a best-in-class product. I introduce design-thinking principles that transformed how we approached the project. The new product enabled drivers to work faster and smarter.

title: Contractor Dispatch Automation
description: One of the many successful projects we launched with Select Home Warranty is a powerful automation system. We used design-thinking and an agile approach to create a custom software system that reduced contractor dispatching from hours to automatic.

title: The Largest Tiny House Marketplace
description: I helped launch the largest real estate marketplace for tiny homes from a simple WordPress site to a scalable customer software product. I led product strategy and a team of designers, developers, and a product manager. I continue to lead product and strategy with the founders and internal development team.
